participant_1.background:
Knitting is my passion.
I am scared of dying.
I love to bake cookies.
I have a dogs.
The county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.

participant_2.background:
I was adopted at a young age to an older couple.
I am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma.
I just got a job working in a gas station.
I enjoy working with my hands and love gardening.

content.text: Hey! I'm participant_1.
Hi there! I'm participant_2.
It's nice to meet you! What do you do for fun?
I like to work with my hands and love gardening.
That's great! I love to knit.
Oh, knitting is so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to do it.
It's really easy to learn! I can teach you sometime if you want.
That would be great! I'd love to learn.
Awesome! So, what do you like about gardening?
I love being outside and working with plants. It's so relaxing and peaceful.
I agree! I love getting my hands dirty and working in the garden.
Me too! It's such a great way to de-stress.
So, what kind of plants do you like to grow?
I like to grow a variety of plants, but my favorites are flowers and vegetables.
Flowers are so beautiful! And vegetables are so delicious.
I agree! I love growing my own vegetables and eating them fresh from the garden.
That's the best! I love it when I can eat fresh produce from my own garden.
Me too! It's so much better than anything you can buy in the store.
So, what's your favorite thing about working in the garden?
I love the feeling of accomplishment when I see my plants growing and thriving. It's so rewarding to see the fruits of your labor.
I agree! It's such a great feeling to know that you grew something from seed to harvest.
It is! I love gardening.
